user.description: If the IP and MAC addresses are left empty, auto-discovery is used

settings.title: Optional settings
settings.description: The key (password) can be retrieved using this tutorial: https://www.domoticz.com/wiki/Xiaomi_Gateway_(Aqara)#Adding_the_Xiaomi_Gateway_to_Domoticz. If the key is not provided only sensors will be accessible

select.description: Select the Xiaomi Aqara Gateway that you wish to connect

error.discovery_error: Failed to discover a Xiaomi Aqara Gateway, try using the IP of the device running HomeAssistant as interface
error.invalid_host: Invalid hostname or IP address, see https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/xiaomi_aqara/#connection-problem

abort.not_xiaomi_aqara: Not a Xiaomi Aqara Gateway, discovered device did not match known gateways

add_device.name: Add device
add_device.description: Enables the join permission of the Xiaomi Aqara Gateway for 30 seconds. A new device can be added afterwards by pressing the pairing button once.

gw_mac.name: Gateway MAC
gw_mac.description: MAC address of the Xiaomi Aqara Gateway.

play_ringtone.name: Play ringtone
play_ringtone.description: Plays a specific ringtone. The version of the gateway firmware must be 1.4.1_145 at least.

ringtone_id.name: Ringtone ID
ringtone_id.description: One of the allowed ringtone ids.

remove_device.name: Remove device
remove_device.description: Removes a specific device. The removal is required if a device shall be paired with another gateway.

device_id.name: Device ID
device_id.description: Hardware address of the device to remove.
